name: Prolimatech PK-Zero 600 g Thermal Paste
Features: [Low Viscosity allows for easy application and better thermal conductivit., Low Dry-out guarantees continued reliable performance long after the compound is applied., No Burn-In Time allows for quick application with immediate results., Non-Electrically Conductive guards against the risk of shorting out valuable components., Non-Corrosive so no risk of damage to delicate electronic surfaces., Material Specification: Al >10(wt%)  ZnO >50(wt%), Adhesiveness: 210000Cps, Thermal Conductivity:  8 W/m - °C, Thermal Impedance: 0.019 °C-in²/W, Specific Gravity:  2.6g/cm³]
